body: Hi, Divided into 2 zones, then assign "Air walls" between to connect them by solving adjacencies. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/O-hEV24HtuYqRlZ3UQ6TWUXzDzdeKqpOXyY9Nfx*SIFI3hPSWARpdFCfJb-AdKKcZYAKBVjCoZ*3SemNAZ8TtLdY2DbNZk5U/image613.png) See [this](http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-7/engineering-reference/shading-module.html#solar-distribution) (solar-distribution). Omid.
